job_tasks.phrase: Execute demonstrations, POCs, and evaluations through coordination of the physical and human resources of Dataiku and the customer; lead the combined team to carry out the agreed upon course of action to prove that Dataiku delivers the needed value better than our competitors
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes leading a team to prove value and compare against competitors, which requires understanding business objectives and demonstrating how a solution meets them.

job_tasks.phrase: Assist in sales pipeline building activities including attendance at live and/or virtual trade-shows and industry conferences, working with marketing and or partners on campaign design and execution and other activities specified by sales and pre-sales management
job_tasks.justification: This describes activities directly supporting sales and marketing, which falls under understanding and contributing to business goals and strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: Answer questions and provide technical guidance to the customer's technical team regarding the demonstrated or evaluated solutions
job_tasks.justification: While not direct development, providing technical guidance on solutions implies understanding the underlying software and its functionalities in a customer-facing context.

soft_skills.phrase: lead the combined team to carry out the agreed upon course of action
Answer questions and provide technical guidance to the customer's technical team
working with marketing and or partners on campaign design and execution
participate in continuous development activities that expand or build on your knowledge and skills with new product releases, GTM programs and initiatives & relevant enablement sessions
lead the combined team to carry out the agreed upon course of action to prove that Dataiku delivers the needed value better than our competitors
Assist in sales pipeline building activities

classification.rationale: This job description focuses heavily on sales support, customer demonstrations, and business value articulation. There is a lack of detailed technical tasks related to AI model development, implementation, or operationalization, which are hallmarks of ML or GenAI Engineer roles.
